articles.title: Three hour queues for lidos as hundreds try to escape heat - ITV News
articles.description:
London's lidos are struggling to cope as hundreds of people turn out in the heat hoping for a cooling swim.

The queue at Brockwell Lido in south London was closed and police were called after a group of young people pushed to the front.
